alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 28 at 2:58AM CST until December 29 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive through parts of the Guadalupe Mountains.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
